Lightdrinker.description: The square this enemy is in acquires [Darkness]. This effect lasts until the end of the round.

Bug's Charge.description: Deal [20+2D] physical damage. (Minor): Until the end of the current Main Process, treat this enemy's Hate Multiplier as x2.

Sacrifice.description: Use this skill before an enemy other than this one would take HP Damage from an attack. This enemy takes the damage instead, and the target is unaffected by the attack. In addition, the character who made the attack takes 15 direct damage, and afterwards, this enemy becomes [Dead].

Stinger Baptism.description: Deal [15+2D] physical damage. (Target: Decay): Increase the damage by +5.

Pursuing Sting.description: Use this skill when the target uses a skill with the [Movement] tag. The target takes [Decay: 3].

Skipping Thorns.description: Deal [4+2D] magical damage. (Minor): This skill's [Attack Check] gains a +2 bonus.

Thorn Burst.description: Use this skill on another enemy when it would deal HP damage. Increase the damage by +10.

Ethereal Body.description: When this enemy take [Cold] or [Spirit] damage, treat its defense as 0. This enemy is not affected by [Mechanical] or [Natural] Props unless it wants to be. Whenever this enemy makes a [Normal Move] it is always considered to be a [Safe Move].

Black Flames of Regret.description: When this enemy appears in a scene, two Skeleton Archers enemies may optionally appear with it. One Skeleton Archer and two Skeletons may be used instead. The enemies that appear because of this effect do not produce Drop Items.

Renew Action.description: Use when this enemy becomes [Post-Action]. This enemy immediately becomes [Pre-Action], and its [Initiative] becomes 0 until the end of the round.

Green Flames of Resentment.description: Deal [20+2D] magical damage. (Minor): Increase the damage by +5. (Fate 1): This skill can be used with [Target: Wide 1 (P)].

Red Flames of Lamentation.description: Use this skill immediately after this enemy takes damage. The character who dealt the damage takes [Weakness (Flame): 10]. Treat this Weakness as a Bad Status.

White Flames of Jealousy.description: This skill can only target characters who have Combat Statuses. The target takes [(# of Combat Status on the Target) x 3] points of direct damage.

Wings of Glass.description: This enemy can always become [Flying]. When this enemy takes [Flame] damage, it must immediately make a [Safe Move] of 3 Sq. Afterwards, it takes [Afflicted] and [Rigor].

Pulse Laser.description: Deal [37 + 2D] physical damage. (Self: Rigor): Increase the damage by +[this enemy's Current HP]. If this effect is triggered, at the end of the current Main Process, this enemy becomes [Incapacitated].

Limiter Release.description: This enemy gains a +10 bonus to damage rolls of [Ranged Attacks].

Unreasoning Operation.description: This enemy does not produce Hate Damage, and Hate Under defense bonuses do not apply to its attacks. If this enemy is targeted with Prop Disable and [Disable Difficulty: 10] is successfully beaten, it becomes [Incapacitated]. This enemy cannot make Move Actions.

Flame Gazer.description: Deal [23+2D] magical damage. This skill cannot be used against the same target in consecutive rounds. (Effect): At the end of the current Main Process, the target makes a [Teleport] to the same square as this enemy.

Many-Legged.description: This enemy is not affected by [Natural] Props unless it wants to be. In addition, this enemy cannot Dash.

Spiderweb Bind.description: Deal [19+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Rigor]. This [Rigor] cannot be removed normally, instead it may only be removed when the target and this enemy are no longer in the same square.

Curse of the Arachnid.description: Use when this enemy becomes [Incapacitated]. The character that made this enemy [Incapacitated] takes 15 direct damage.

Goblin Rage (Gob Mob).description: Use this skill when this enemy takes [Spirit] damage. This enemy immediately uses Gob Mob. Increase the damage of Gob Mob by +5.

Gob Mob.description: Deal [33+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Pursuit: 5].

Line Breaker.description: This enemy makes a [Safe Move] up to 2 Sq. (Minor): Increase the distance moved by +1 Sq.

Goblin Rage (Gob Magic).description: Use this skill when this enemy takes [Spirit] damage. This enemy immediately uses Gob Magic. Increase the damage of Gob Magic by +5.

Gob Magic.description: Deal [30+2D] magical damage. (Result 17): The target takes [Dazed] and [Afflicted].

Arcana Subjugation.description: During this Main Process, this enemy's [Magic Attacks] use [Target: Wide 1 (P)].

Amorphous Body.description: Whenever this enemy takes [Cold] damage, it also takes [Afflicted] and [Dazed]. This enemy's [Normal Moves] are always [Safe Moves].

Coat & Digest.description: Deal [15+2D] magical damage to the target, and the target takes [Dazed]. (Target: Engulfed): The damage is penetrating.

Devour.description: Select a target with [Dazed]. The target gains the [Engulfed] tag. Treat this effect as a Bad Status that is only removed once the target and this enemy are not in the same square.

Amorphous Body.description: Whenever this enemy takes [Cold] damage, it also takes [Afflicted] and [Dazed]. This enemy's [Normal Moves] are always [Safe Moves].

Corrosive Drops.description: Deal [35+2D] physical damage. (Success): The target takes a -4 penalty to [Physical Defense]. Treat this effect as a Bad Status. (Minor): The target takes [Rigor].

Suspicious Puddle.description: This enemy becomes [Hidden], then makes a [Safe Move] up to 2 Sq. without losing [Hidden]. (Minor): Increase the distance moved by +1 Sq.

Unreasoning Operation.description: This enemy does not produce Hate Damage, and Hate Under defense bonuses do not apply to its attacks. If this enemy is targeted with Prop Disable and [Disable Difficulty: 10] is successfully beaten, it becomes [Incapacitated]. This enemy cannot make Move Actions.

Poison Spore.description: This skill cannot target the Gregarious Asphyxmoss. Deal [30+2D] magical damage. (Result 16): The target takes [Decay: 6].

Kobold Tactics.description: This enemy is not affected by [Mechanical] Props unless it wants to be. In addition, whenever this enemy is in the same square as another character with the [Kobold] tag, it gains a +1 bonus to [Dodge Checks].

Kobo Slash.description: Deal [23+2D] physical damage. (Minor): Increase the damage by +5.

Dash & Jump.description: This enemy may make a [Safe Move] of 1 Sq. During this movement, the enemy can move diagonally. (Minor): Increase the distance moved by +1 Sq.

Kobold Tactics.description: This enemy is not affected by [Mechanical] Props unless it wants to be. In addition, whenever this enemy is in the same square as another character with the [Kobold] tag, it gains a +1 bonus to [Dodge Checks].

Thunder Kobolt.description: Deal [17+2D] magical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Staggered].

Spell Adepts.description: This enemy gains a +10 bonus to the damage roll of a [Magic Attack].

Kobold Tactics.description: This enemy is not affected by [Mechanical] Props unless it wants to be. In addition, whenever this enemy is in the same square as another character with the [Kobold] tag, it gains a +1 bonus to [Dodge Checks].

Kobold Platoon.description: When this enemy appears in a scene, two Kobold Caster enemies may optionally appear with it. One Kobold Caster and two Kobolds may be used instead. The enemies that appear because of this effect do not produce Drop Items.

Renew Action.description: Use when this enemy becomes [Post-Action]. This enemy immediately becomes [Pre-Action], and its [Initiative] becomes 0 until the end of the round.

Fierce Howling Magic Spear.description: Deal [12+2D] physical damage (Minor): The target takes [Dazed]. (Fate 1): This skill may be used with [Target: Area (P)].

Howling Punishment.description: Use this skill on a character with [Hate Top]. The target takes [Pursuit: 5].

Renew Action II.description: Use this skill on a target who has just become [Post-Action]. The target immediately becomes [Pre-Action], and their [Initiative] becomes 0 until the end of the round.

Hidden Mastermind.description: When this enemy appears in a scene, any two enemies that are CR3 or lower with the [Humanoid] or [Human] tags may optionally appear with it. One enemy and two [Mob] enemies with CR3 and the [Humanoid] or [Human] tags may be used instead. The enemies that appear because of this effect do not produce Drop Items.

Genius Talisman.description: When this enemy appears in a scene, it appears [Hidden]. When this enemy makes [Normal Moves] or [Safe Moves], it does not lose [Hidden]. When this enemy takes [Blight] damage, it also takes [Staggered].

Silhouette Arms.description: This skill cannot be used unless this enemy is the only enemy in the scene. Deal [20+2D] physical damage. (Minor): Increase the damage by +5.

Shadow Spinner.description: (Self: Hidden): The target gains a +15 bonus to damage rolls. In addition, the target gains [Cancel (Magical Damage): 10].

Spreading Despair.description: The target takes 10 direct damage. The target's Hate increases by +2, and they remove 1 Combat Status (GM's Choice). (Fate 1): This enemy becomes [Hidden].

Ursine Claw.description: Deal [16+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Rigor]. This [Rigor] cannot be removed normally, instead it may only be removed when the target and this enemy are no longer in the same square.

Lord of the Forest.description: Use before an enemy other than this one would take HP Damage from an attack. This enemy takes the damage instead, and the target is unaffected by the attack. In addition, the damage this enemy takes is reduced by -5.

Spirit of the Wind.description: This enemy always has [Cancel (Shock): 5], and is immune to [Rigor]. Whenever this enemy takes [Blight] damage, treat its defense as 0. This enemy always has [Flying].

Shocking Sting.description: Deal [25+2D] physical damage. (Self: Hidden): The target takes [Staggered].

Hidden Flight.description: This enemy becomes [Hidden]. (Minor): The enemy can make a [Safe Move] up to 2 Sq. without losing [Hidden].

Rage Strike.description: Deal [16+2D] physical damage. (Minor): Until the end of the current Main Process, treat this enemy's Hate Multiplier as x2.

Izuna's Return.description: Use this skill when an enemy other than this one makes an attack. The target of that attack takes 10 direct damage.

Swashbuckler's Flurry.description: Deal [27+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Pursuit: 10].

Unicorn Jump.description: This enemy gains [Flying] and makes a [Safe Move] up to 3 Sq. At the end of the movement, the enemy loses [Flying]. (Minor): Increase the distance moved by +1 Sq.

Rat-Fu.description: This enemy's [Normal Moves] always count as [Safe Moves].

Rat Shot.description: Deal [22+2D] physical damage to the target. (Minor): The target takes [Decay: 5].

Rat Shield.description: Use this skill when the target becomes [Incapacitated] or [Dead]. The target removes the [Incapacitated] or [Dead] condition, and recovers 5 HP. This enemy then takes 10 direct damage.

Spirit of Fire.description: This enemy always has [Cancel (Flame): 10]. Whenever this enemy takes [Cold] damage, treat its defense as 0.

Bloody Hatchet.description: Deal [33+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Decay: 5].

Sneaky Walk.description: This enemy may make a [Normal Move] up to 2 Sq. If the enemy ends its movement in the same square as a [Natural] Prop, it gains a +2 bonus to [Dodge Checks]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status that is removed after applying once.

Unreasoning Operation.description: This enemy does not produce Hate Damage, and Hate Under defense bonuses do not apply to its attacks. If this enemy is targeted with Prop Disable and [Disable Difficulty: 10] is successfully beaten, it becomes [Incapacitated]. This enemy cannot make Move Actions.

Rapid Fire.description: Deal [20+2D] physical damage, and the target takes [Pursuit: 5]. (Target: Pursuit): The [Pursuit] stack this attack triggered is not removed.

Spirit of Fire.description: This enemy always has [Cancel (Flame): 10]. Whenever this enemy takes [Cold] damage, treat its defense as 0.

Dancing Inferno.description: During this Main Process, this enemy's [Magic Attack] can be used with [Target: Wide 1 (P)].

It's a Trick!.description: This enemy always appears in a scene with [Hidden]. In addition, whenever it takes [Blight] damage, it is also [Staggered].

Farm Archer.description: Deal [25+2D] physical damage. (Result 17): Increase the damage by +10. Also, the target makes a [Safe Move (forced)] of 1 Sq.

Surprise Arrow.description: (Self: Hidden): During this enemy's Main Process, it gains a +2D bonus to [Attack Rolls] of [Ranged Attacks].

Filthy Fangs.description: Deal [20+2D] physical damage to the target. (Minor): The target takes [Decay: 5]

Raging Rat.description: Use this skill when the [Hate Top] character is outside [Range: Close]. This enemy may make a [Safe Move] up to 3 Sq. (Fate 1): If you have reached your limit for this skill, you may pay this cost to use it again.

Bag of Bones.description: This enemy always has [Weakness (Flame): 5] and [Weakness (Hafted): 5]. In addition, whenever this enemy takes [Holy] damage, it also takes [Dazed].

Tarnished Longsword.description: Deal [30+2D] physical damage. (Minor): Increase the damage by +5. (Self: Pursuit): Increase the damage by +5.

Grudge Sword.description: This enemy gains a +10 bonus to the damage roll of a [Melee Attack].

Bag of Bones.description: This enemy always has [Weakness (Flame): 5] and [Weakness (Hafted): 5]. In addition, whenever this enemy takes [Holy] damage, it also takes [Dazed].

Ancient Bow.description: Deal [30+2D] physical damage. (Minor): At the end of this enemy's Main Process, it may make a [Safe Move] of 1 Sq. This additional effect cannot be used if this enemy has [Rigor]. (Self: Pursuit): Increase the damage by +5.

Grudge Arrow.description: This enemy gains a +10 bonus to the damage roll of a [Ranged Attack].

Heart of Plants.description: This enemy always has [Weakness (Flame): 5], and is immune to [Confusion].

Vine Whip.description: Deal [25+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Rigor].

Creeping Roots.description: This enemy may make a [Safe Move] up to 2 Sq.

Wriggling Rot.description: This enemy always has [Weakness (Holy): 5], and is immune to [Dazed] and [Staggered]. Characters in the same square as this enemy cannot use items with the [Consumable] tag. This enemy cannot Dash.

Grab.description: Deal [25+2D] physical damage. (Minor): The target takes [Rigor].

Chomp.description: This enemy gains a +5 bonus to the damage roll of a [Melee Attack]. (Target: Rigor): The bonus is +15 instead.
